about_the_game:
Tidy Backpack is a relaxing puzzle game where you must arrange found fantasy loot in your backpack in a tidy way. Find rare items and learn details about the old world.

In this Demo you'll find:
  • 12 handcrafted levels
  • 6 unique items revealing the story of the old world
  • Relaxing gameplay
  • Simple controls
  • Cozy graphics
  • Chill music
